name: Deep Dark Demo
description:
Deep Dark is a short horror game idea I had when brainstorming what I could do for my first game project. I was inspired by the experience that was Iron Lung and originally my game was to take place in space before I decided on a setting I personally fear. The depths of the ocean. 

Before making a larger full game I wanted to make the demo to first see if there would be interest. A full game would have a complete facility, external diving level, simple storyline and much more polish.  I will consider this demo a success if it reaches 1000 downloads

If you enjoy this demo and want a full game please comment below or follow me on my twitter.
